articles.author: Sarra Gray
articles.title: Measles outbreak: Adults warned of catching 'dangerous' illness as risks are higher in older people - GB News
articles.description: A fresh warning has been shared as cases of measles rise in the UK and across Europe at an "alarming rate".Doctors have warned adults may be more at risk than they realise of the contagious illness. The number of people contracting measles has increased by 20…
articles.content:

Doctors have warned adults may be more at risk than they realise of the contagious illness… [+5598 chars]

articles.author: Science Desk
articles.title: Re-excavation of a German cave rewrites the history of humans in Europe - The Indian Express
articles.description: Three new studies based on the discovery of fossils in a German cavesite say that humans moved into Northern Europe much earlier than previously thought.
articles.content: Homo sapiens bone and tool fragments discovered in a cave site in Germany reveal that humans moved to Northern Europe more than 45,000 years ago, bearing extremely cold climatic conditions, according… [+2147 chars]
